    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       How to Think about Weird Things &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Nov 3, 2014
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/weirdthings
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17347164">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17347164">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17347164">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17347164">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3601
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17347164" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17347165">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17347165">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17347165">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17347165">
          <p>
           To get the full-text of an article:
          </p>
          <p>
           If you are in a library database with "Get-it" buttons, click on "Get-it." This button will take you the full text of your article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library,
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           the book or article.
          </p>
          <p>
           If you have citation information for the article (journal title, year, title, etc.), type the information about your article in the
           <a title="Citation Help Page" href="http://0-me9qj4aj8y.search.serialssolutions.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/?SS_Page=refiner&amp;SS_RefinerEditable=yes">
            article finder
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article. If not, you can request a copy of the article via&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. Look to the far right of the article's title to see if there is a link to a freely available copy.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17347165" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17347167">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17347167">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17347167">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Entries in Reference Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17347167">
          <p>
           <span style="font-weight: bold;">
           </span>
           <span style="font-weight: bold;">
            Encyclopedia of the Paranormal
           </span>
           <br />
           Reference 133.03 S819e
          </p>
          <p>
           <span style="font-weight: bold;">
            Skeptic Encyclopedia of Pseudoscience
           </span>
           <br />
           Reference 503 S553s v.1-2
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17347167" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20419551">
              <a id="link_20419551" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20419551,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Many reference sources online in one place.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23074167">
              <a id="link_23074167" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discoveryoclc/70157991" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23074167,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23074167}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Anthropology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This five-volume Encyclopedia of Anthropology is a unique collection of over 1000 entries that focuses on topics in physical/ biological anthropology, archaeology, cultural/social anthropology, linguistics, and applied anthropology. Also included are relevant articles on geology, paleontology, biology, evolution, sociology, psychology, philosophy, and theology.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23074189">
              <a id="link_23074189" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discoveryoclc/55969991" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23074189,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23074189}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Occultism and Parapsychology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covers recent and historical phenomena, topics, concepts, cults, personalities, organizations, and publications associated with the fields of occultism and parapsychology. Includes over 2,000 biographies of prominent individuals and personalities in these fields; country entries on the development of occultism and parapsychology; and pro and con narrative on some of the controversial topics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23073715">
              <a id="link_23073715" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23073715,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17347168">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17347168">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17347168">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17347168">
          <div id="boxatt17347168" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23112020">
              <a id="link_23112020" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23112020,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20419616">
              <a id="link_20419616" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20419616,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12782172}); ">
               GoogleBooks
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google has digitized millions of books, some of which are freely available online. Muhlenberg affiliated atrons of Trexler Library can interlibrary loan books not freely available as full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20419553">
              <a id="link_20419553" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20419553,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe. Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon. Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17347169">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17347169">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17347169">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17347169">
          <div id="boxatt17347169" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20419554">
              <a id="link_20419554" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20419554,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Large and diverse database that covers most academic disciplines that contains both scholarly and non-academic resources. Includes many articles in full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23073501">
              <a id="link_23073501" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23073501,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20419555">
              <a id="link_20419555" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20419555,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Searchable collections of full-text journals from a wide variety of disciplines
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23086885">
              <a id="link_23086885" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=phl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23086885,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730094}); ">
               Philosopher's Index
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Indexing of journals and books of philosophy from 1940 to present, with links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20419705">
              <a id="link_20419705" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20419705,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Indexes and abstracts professional and academic literature in psychology and related disciplines.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20419714">
              <a id="link_20419714" href="http://www.sciencedirect.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20419714,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974160}); ">
               ScienceDirect College Edition Health and Life Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This database includes 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health and life sciences. Coverage spans 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19745677">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19745677">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19745677">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19745677">
          <div id="boxatt19745677" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23073722">
              <a id="link_23073722" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23073722,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'How to Think about Weird Things', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016968}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4708274" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17347310">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17347310">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17347310">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17347310">
          <p dir="ltr">
           For
           <strong>
            information
           </strong>
           on citation styles, consult the following resources:
          </p>
          <p>
           Writer's Handbook (University of Wisconsin--Madison)
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.wisc.edu/writing/Handbook/Documentation.html">
            http://www.wisc.edu/writing/Handbook/Documentation.html
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           Trexler Library handouts on APA, MLA, and Chicago styles:
           <br />
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html
           </a>
           <br />
           <i>
            GETTING THERE: Library Homepage&nbsp;--&nbsp;
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
             Citation Guides
            </a>
            (in the Research box).
           </i>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17347310" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17347170">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17347170">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17347170">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17347170">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17347170" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
